title: Genetically encoded sensor isolates hidden leukemic stem cells

title_detail.value: Genetically encoded sensor isolates hidden leukemic stem cells

summary: Researchers have devised a novel biosensor that can isolate and target leukemic stem cells. It can provide a prototype for precision oncology efforts to target patient-specific cells to fight the deadly disease.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have devised a novel biosensor that can isolate and target leukemic stem cells. It can provide a prototype for precision oncology efforts to target patient-specific cells to fight the deadly disease.
